about_the_game:
Twilight Tails is an immersive interactive adventure where you step into the role of a raccoon to survive in the mysterious wild. Venture into the unknown, where every bush, tree, and underground realm holds secrets and challenges.

Key Features:

Realistic Wild Environment: Immerse yourself in the picturesque world of forests, mountains, and water bodies, where you must fight for your place among other wild animals.

Flying and Seasonal Changes: Experience the impact of various weather conditions and seasons, from storms to spring blossoms, influencing your survival strategies.

Co-op Mode: Survive alone or form alliances with other players, sharing responsibilities for protection against predators and the search for food.

Building Shelters and Traps: Showcase your survival skills by constructing shelters and setting traps to outsmart predators and secure your territory.

Twilight Tails will transport you to the heart of nature, where each day brings new challenges and incredible adventures. Navigate the mysterious forest with your paws, prove your dominance in the survival game, and master the art of crafting shelters and traps among the diverse inhabitants of the wild.

name: Twilight Tails

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Twilight Tails is a captivating game where you become a raccoon navigating a challenging forest. Fight for territory, survive changing seasons, and evolve in multiplayer adventures. Conquer the jungle, rule survival!
supported_languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
